####################################################################################### # PURPOSE: This script is used to install the LAMP Server on the linux machine # # LAMP Server includes Apache httpd Server, MySQL database server, PHP and PHPMyAdmin # # installed and configured. # #######################################################################################
#!/bin/bash
# IMPORT GLOBAL CONFIGURATION DATA FROM APPLICATION DIRECTOR . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
########################## INTERNAL FUNCTIONS REGION ##################################
# VALIDATION FUNCTIONS -- START # FUNCTION TO CHECK ERROR function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
# FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 }
# FUNCTION TO VALIDATE IP ADDRESS function valid_ip() { local ip=$1 local stat=1 if [[ $ip =~ ^[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}$ ]]; then OIFS=$IFS IFS='.' ip=($ip) IFS=$OIFS [[ ${ip[0]} -le 255 && ${ip[1]} -le 255 \ && ${ip[2]} -le 255 && ${ip[3]} -le 255 ]] stat=$? fi return $stat }
# FUNCTION TO VALIDATE THE INTEGER function valid_int() { local data=$1 if [[ $data =~ ^[0-9]{1,9}$ ]]; then return 0; else return 1 fi }
# FUNCTION TO VALIDATE NAME STRING function valid_string() { local data=$1 if [[ $data =~ ^[A-Za-z]{1,}[A-Za-z0-9_-]{1,}$ ]]; then return 0; else return 1; fi }
# FUNCTION TO VALIDATE PASSWORD function valid_password() { local data=$1 length=${#data} if [ $length -le 5 ]; then check_error "PASSWORD MUST BE OF AT LEAST 5 CHARACTERS" else if [[ $data =~ ^[A-Za-z]{1,}[0-9_@$%^+=]{0,}[A-Za-z0-9]{0,}$ ]]; then return 0; else return 1; fi fi } # VALIDATION FUNCTIONS -- END
########################## SCRIPT EXECUTION REGION ################################## # SCRIPT EXECUTION -- START
# PARAMETER VALIDATION -- START echo "PARAMTER VALIDATION -- START" if [ "x${lamp_server_ip}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "LAMP SERVER IP ADDRESS NOT SET." else if ! valid_ip ${lamp_server_ip}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER LAMP SERVER IP." fi fi if [ "x${http_port}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "HTTP PORT NOT SET." else if ! valid_int ${http_port}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER HTTP PORT.MUST BE AN INTEGER" fi fi if [ "x${http_proxy_port}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "HTTP PROXY PORT NOT SET." else if ! valid_int ${http_proxy_port}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER HTTP PROXY PORT.MUST BE AN INTEGER" fi fi if [ "x${db_port}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "DB PORT NOT SET." else if ! valid_int ${db_port}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER DB PORT.MUST BE AN INTEGER" fi fi if [ "x${db_root_username}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "DB ROOT USERNAME NOT SET." else if ! valid_string ${db_root_username}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER DB ROOT USERNAME" fi fi if [ "x${db_root_password}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "DB ROOT PASSWORD NOT SET." else if ! valid_password ${db_root_password}; then error_exit "INVALID PARAMETER DB ROOT PASSWORD" fi fi if [ "x${phpMyAdmin_url}" = "x" ]; then error_exit "PHPMYADMIN URL NOT SET." fi echo "PARAMTER VALIDATION -- DONE" # PARAMETER VALIDATION -- END
# INSTALLATION OF LAMP -- START echo "INSTALLING LAMP SERVER..."
if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ] ; then
REV=`cat /etc/redhat-release | sed s/.*release\ // | sed s/\ .*//` DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` ARCH=`uname -p` if [ $ARCH == "i686" ] ; then echo "$DIST 32 BIT MACHINE - v$REV" basearch="i386" else echo "$DIST 64 BIT MACHINE - v$REV" basearch="x86_64" yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y clean all fi echo $REV | grep -q '6.' if [ $? -eq 0 ] ; then release=6 subrelease=7 else release=5 subrelease=4 fi
# INSTALLATION OF REMI REPOSITORY -- START wget http://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/$release/$basearch/epel-release-$release-$subrelease.noarch.rpm check_error "ERROR WHILE DOWNLOADING epel REPOSITORY" wget http://rpms.famillecollet.com/enterprise/remi-release-$release.rpm check_error "ERROR WHILE DOWNLOADING remi REPOSITORY" rpm -Uvh remi-release-$release*.rpm epel-release-$release*.rpm check_error "ERROR WHILE INSTALLING epel and remi REPOSITORY" if [ "$DIST" = "Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server" ] ; then sed -i "s|\$releasever|6|g" /etc/yum.repos.d/remi.repo fi # INSTALLATION OF REMI REPOSITORY -- END
yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y clean all yum --enablerepo=remi install -y httpd mysql-server php php-common php-mysql php-pear php-xsl php-gd php-mbstring php-mcrypt check_error "ERROR WHILE INSTALLING LAMP"
DOCUMENT_ROOT="/var/www/html"
elif [ -f /etc/SuSE-release ] ; then
zypper --non-interactive --no-gpg-checks install apache2 mysql mysql-tools php5 php5-mysql php-pear php5-xsl php5-gd php5-mcrypt php5-mbstring apache2-mod_php5 check_error "ERROR WHILE INSTALLING LAMP"
DOCUMENT_ROOT="/srv/www/htdocs" mkdir -p $DOCUMENT_ROOT
elif [ -f /etc/debian_version ] ; then
apt-get --fix-missing -fy install apache2 mysql-client mysql-server php5 php5-cli php5-mysql php5-xsl php5-gd php5-mcrypt libapache2-mod-php5 libapache2-mod-auth-mysql php-pear check_error "ERROR WHILE INSTALLING LAMP"
DOCUMENT_ROOT="/var/www" fi
# INSTALLING PHPMYADMIN
cd $DOCUMENT_ROOT # DOWNLOAD THE PHPMYADMIN INSTALLER wget $phpMyAdmin_url check_error "ERROR WHILE DOWNLOADING PHPMYADMIN INSTALLER"
# EXTRACT THE PHPMYADMIN INSTALLER TAR BALL FILE tar xvfz phpMyAdmin*.tar.gz check_error "ERROR WHILE EXTRACTING THE PHPMYADMIN INSTALLER"
# REMOVE THE PHPMYADMIN TAR BALL FILE TO SAVE THE DISK SPACE rm -rf phpMyAdmin*.tar.gz
# MOVE THE EXTRACTED FOLDER OF THE PHPMYADMIN TO phpmyadmin FOR EASY ACCESS FROM THE LAMP SERVER IP mv `find . -name 'phpMyAdmin*' -type d` phpmyadmin
echo "LAMP SERVER INSTALLED SUCCESSFULLY" # INSTALLATION OF LAMP -- DONE # SCRIPT EXECUTION -- END

####################################################################################### # PURPOSE: This script is used to configure the LAMP Server on the linux machine # # Configuration involes # # 1. setting listening port of the apache httpd server # # 2. setting database port # # 3. setting password for the root user of the database server. # # 4. setting listen address of the database server. # # 5. configure mysql to handle big packets # # 6. configure php to handle big packets # # 7. assigning database port for the phpmyadmin # #######################################################################################
#!/bin/bash
########################## INTERNAL FUNCTIONS REGION ##################################
# VALIDATION FUNCTIONS -- START # FUNCTION TO CHECK ERROR function check_error() { if [ ! "$?" = "0" ]; then error_exit "$1"; fi }
# FUNCTION TO DISPLAY ERROR AND EXIT function error_exit() { echo "${PROGNAME}: ${1:-"Unknown Error"}" 1>&2 exit 1 } # VALIDATION FUNCTIONS -- END
########################## SCRIPT EXECUTION REGION ################################## # CONFIGURATION OF LAMP -- START
if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ] ; then
# CONFIGURE APACHE TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR PORT sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO HANDLE BIG PACKETS sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" /etc/my.cnf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR PORT sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\port=$db_port/g" /etc/my.cnf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR IP sed -i 's/bind-address.*/bind-address = $lamp_server_ip/' /etc/my.cnf
PHPMYADMIN_CONF="/etc/httpd/conf.d/phpmyadmin.conf" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE phpmyadmin.conf FILE DOCUMENT_ROOT="/var/www/html" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE APACHE HOSTING DIRECTORY. PHP_INI_FILE="/etc/php.ini" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE php.ini FILE. MYSQL_SERVICE="/etc/init.d/mysqld start" # MySQL SERVICE NAME TO START
elif [ -f /etc/debian_version ] ; then
# CONFIGURE APACHE TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR PORT sed -ie "s/^NameVirtualHost .*/NameVirtualHost \*\:$http_port/g" /etc/apache2/ports.conf sed -ie "s/Listen .*/Listen $http_port/g" /etc/apache2/ports.conf sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $lamp_server_ip\:$http_port\nListen $lamp_server_ip\:$http_proxy_port/g" /etc/apache2/ports.conf sed -ie "s/\<VirtualHost .*/VirtualHost \*\:$http_port\>/g" /etc/apache2/sites-enabled/000-default sed -ie "s/\<VirtualHost .*/VirtualHost \*\:$http_port\>/g" /etc/apache2/sites-available/default-ssl
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO HANDLE BIG PACKETS sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" /etc/mysql/my.cnf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR PORT sed -ie "s/port.*/port = $db_port/g" /etc/mysql/my.cnf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR IP sed -i 's/bind-address.*/bind-address = $lamp_server_ip/' /etc/mysql/my.cnf
PHPMYADMIN_CONF="/etc/apache2/conf.d/phpmyadmin.conf" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE phpmyadmin.conf FILE DOCUMENT_ROOT="/var/www" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE APACHE HOSTING DIRECTORY. PHP_INI_FILE="/etc/php5/cli/php.ini" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE php.ini FILE. MYSQL_SERVICE="" # MySQL SERVICE NAME TO START. THIS IS BLANK AS MYSQL SERVICE HAS ALREADY BEEN STARTED DURING ITS INSTALLATION IN UBUNTU.
elif [ -f /etc/SuSE-release ] ; then
echo "Welcome to openSUSE 11.0. Apache2 works" > /srv/www/htdocs/index.html
# CONFIGURE APACHE TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR PORT sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/apache2/listen.conf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO LISTEN ON PARTICULAR PORT sed -ie "s/port.*/port = $db_port/g" /etc/my.cnf
# CONFIGURE MYSQL TO HANDLE BIG PACKETS sed -ie "s/max_allowed_packet.*/max_allowed_packet = 1024M/g" /etc/my.cnf
PHPMYADMIN_CONF="/etc/apache2/conf.d/phpmyadmin.conf" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE phpmyadmin.conf FILE DOCUMENT_ROOT="/srv/www/htdocs" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE APACHE HOSTING DIRECTORY. PHP_INI_FILE="/etc/php5/cli/php.ini" # THE FULL PATH FOR THE php.ini FILE. MYSQL_SERVICE="/etc/init.d/mysql start" # MySQL SERVICE NAME TO START fi
# START THE MYSQL SERVICE, IF IT IS NOT YET STARTED $MYSQL_SERVICE &
if [ -f /etc/redhat-release ] ; then MYSQL_STATE=`/etc/init.d/mysqld status | awk '{print $5}' | sed "s/\..*//"` # RHEL elif [ -f /etc/SuSE-release ] ; then MYSQL_STATE=`/etc/init.d/mysql status | awk '{print $5}' | sed "s/\.*//"` # return running #SuSe fi
# WAIT FOR MYSQL START TO COMPLETE wait_interval=30 wait_limit=1200
for (( wait_c=0 ; wait_c <= $wait_limit; )) ; do echo "WAITING FOR MYSQL SERVEICE TO START..."
if [ "${MYSQL_STATE}" = "running" ]; then # FINAL WAIT FOR THINGS TO SETTLE DOWN sleep $wait_interval; echo "MYSQL SERVICE STARTED SUCCESSFULLY"; break; fi
if [ $wait_c -gt $wait_limit ] ; then error_exit "Abort. MYSQL DID NOT START WITHIN $wait_limit seconds."; fi
wait_c=`expr $wait_c + $wait_interval`; sleep $wait_interval; done
# ASSIGN A PASSWORD FOR MYSQL ADMIN ROOT USER echo "ASSIGN A PASSWORD FOR MYSQL ADMIN ROOT USER..." mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password check_error "ERROR:CANNOT ASSIGN NEW PASSWORD TO MYSQL DATABASE" echo "ASSIGN A PASSWORD FOR MYSQL ADMIN ROOT USER -- DONE"
# CONFIGURE PHP sed -i 's/.*upload_max_filesize.*/upload_max_filesize = 50M/g' $PHP_INI_FILE sed -i 's/.*memory_limit.*/memory_limit = 128M/g' $PHP_INI_FILE sed -i 's/.*max_execution_time.*/max_execution_time = 120/g' $PHP_INI_FILE sed -i 's/.*post_max_size.*/post_max_size = 50M/g' $PHP_INI_FILE
# CONFIGURE PHPMYADMIN cp $DOCUMENT_ROOT/phpmyadmin/config.sample.inc.php $DOCUMENT_ROOT/phpmyadmin/config.inc.php check_error "ERROR WHILE COPYING PHP CONFIGURATION FILE" sed -i "s|.*blowfish_secret.*|\$cfg['blowfish_secret'] = 'a8b7c6def231';|" $DOCUMENT_ROOT/phpmyadmin/config.inc.php sed -ie "s/\$cfg\['Servers'\]\[\$i\]\['host'\].*/$& \n\$cfg\['Servers'\]\[\$i\]\['port'\] = '$db_port';/g" $DOCUMENT_ROOT/phpmyadmin/config.inc.php echo "Alias /phpMyAdmin /usr/share/phpmyadmin" >> $PHPMYADMIN_CONF
echo "<?php phpinfo(); ?>" > $DOCUMENT_ROOT/phpinfo.php # CONFIGURATION OF LAMP -- DONE
